title-part.text: DOMESTIC PLUMBING INSTALLATIONS FOR FRESH WATER OR WASTE WATER

reference.text: not connected to either water-supply main or to waste pipe A47K; devices of the kind used in the ground E03B, E03F

title-part.text: SINKS

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Domestic plumbing installations for fresh water or waste water
Sinks
